term.title: resonance hybrid

item.text: A localized valence bond representation of a molecule. This describes pictorially an electronic wavefunction that makes some contribution to the state wavefunction of the system. Resonance hybrids are needed to describe the state of a system when that system is not adequately described by a single Lewis structure.
